author: Matt Burns
title: Detroit to be first to deploy Abbott Lab’s 5-minute COVID-19 test, mayor says
description: Detroit Mayor Mike Duggan said today on Wolf Blitzer’s CNN show that the city of Detroit is on track to be the first city to deploy Abbott Lab’s 5 minute Covid-19 test. The mayor said that the test would be available for first responders. The goal, he said, w…
content: Detroit Mayor Mike Duggan said today on Wolf Blitzers CNN show that the city of Detroit is on track to be the first city to deploy Abbott Labs’ five-minute COVID-19 test. The mayor said the test would be available for first responders. The goal, he said, was … [+1780 chars]
